patthana2.1:10.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:10.2: alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho, adosaṃ paṭicca alobho amoho, amohaṃ paṭicca alobho adoso, lobhaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca lobho, dosaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca doso;
patthana2.1:11.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:11.2: hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:12.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:12.2: alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:12.3: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:13.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:13.2: nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:13.7: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana2.1:14.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:15.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:15.2: nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:15.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca hetū sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.1:16.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:16.2: alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:16.3: Lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho, dosañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho … pe …
patthana2.1:16.7: alobhañca vatthuñca paṭicca adoso amoho … pe …. #1
patthana2.1:17.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:17.2: nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca hetuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:17.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuñca hetuñca paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. #2
patthana2.1:18.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:18.2: nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca alobhañca paṭicca dve khandhā adoso amoho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana2.1:18.6: Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:18.12: vatthuñca alobhañca paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.1:20.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā arūpeyeva nava pañhā) …
patthana2.1:20.2: adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi, paripuṇṇaṃ) ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana2.1:23.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.1:28.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:28.2: ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:28.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana2.1:29.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:29.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.1:31.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:32.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:33.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:33.2: hetuñca nahetuñca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:35.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:35.3: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca lobho;
patthana2.1:36.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:36.2: arūpe hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, hetuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:37.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:37.2: arūpe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:37.3: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:38.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:38.2: arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana2.1:39.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:40.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:40.2: arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:41.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:41.2: arūpe alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:41.3: Arūpe lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:42.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:42.2: arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:42.6: nahetū khandhe ca hetuñca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, hetuñca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:43.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:43.2: arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:43.7: Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:45.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā …
patthana2.1:47.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:48.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:49.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:49.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā. #1
patthana2.1:50.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā … nava.
patthana2.1:52.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—
patthana2.1:52.20: ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana2.1:55.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:59.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:63.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve … pe … kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.1:66.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi paṭiccavārasadisāyeva pañhā. Mahābhūtesu niṭṭhitesu “vatthuṃ paccayā”ti kātabbā. Pañcāyatanāni anulomepi paccanīyepi yathā labbhanti tathā kātabbā. Saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paripuṇṇo. Rūpaṃ natthi, arūpameva.)
patthana2.1:71.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:71.3: Lobho mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo, doso mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:72.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:72.2: hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:73.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:73.2: alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:75.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:76.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:77.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:77.2: hetuṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:78.1: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:78.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati.
patthana2.1:78.7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:78.11: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:78.12: Ariyā nahetū pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:78.14: vatthuṃ, nahetū khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.1:78.17: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nahetucittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana2.1:78.26: nahetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:79.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:79.3: (Paṭhamagamanaṃyeva, āvajjanā natthi. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe … phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassāti idaṃ natthi.) #2
patthana2.1:80.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:80.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:81.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:81.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:82.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:82.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:83.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:83.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:85.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:85.6: hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:86.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:86.4: hetuṃ garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:86.6: hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:87.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:87.4: hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:87.6: hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:88.1: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:88.7: nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:89.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:89.5: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yāva vatthu nahetū ca khandhā tāva kātabbaṃ.)
patthana2.1:89.7: Sahajātādhipatinahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:90.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:90.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā ca hetū ca uppajjanti, pubbe suciṇṇāni.
patthana2.1:90.7: (Yāva vatthu nahetū khandhā, ca tāva kātabbaṃ.)
patthana2.1:90.9: nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:91.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:91.3: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:92.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:92.3: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:93.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:93.3: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:95.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:96.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:96.2: purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:97.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:97.2: purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:98.1: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:98.2: purimā purimā nahetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:98.3: anulomaṃ gotrabhussa (saṃkhittaṃ) nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:99.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …. #2
patthana2.1:100.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:101.1: Hetū ca nahetū ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:101.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:102.1: Hetū ca nahetū ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:102.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:103.1: Hetū ca nahetū ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:103.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:105.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṃ.)
patthana2.1:105.3: Sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo (ime dvepi paṭiccasadisā. Nissayapaccayo paccayavāre nissayapaccayasadiso.)
patthana2.1:107.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:108.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:109.1: Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:109.5: hetū hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:110.1: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:111.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:112.1: Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:301.2: vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.1:302.1: Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti sahajātapaccayā—

patthana2.1:303.1: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—
patthana2.1:303.2: sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:303.6: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.1:319.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, nanissaye tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:323.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.

patthana2.1:387.18: ahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. #2

patthana2.1:402.1: Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:403.1: Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:403.3: āvajjanā vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.1:404.2: purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:405.1: Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:405.3: vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca ahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana2.1:413.10: moho kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:413.14: bhojanaṃ, senāsanaṃ, moho ca kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.1:414.5: kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …

patthana2.1:421.9: kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;

patthana2.1:472.1: Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.1:474.1: Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:475.1: Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:476.1: Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:477.1: Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:481.1: Nahetuyā nava … pe … (sabbattha nava) noavigate nava.
patthana2.1:485.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha … pe … namagge cha, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.1:489.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.1:494.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:494.2: hetusampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:495.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:503.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:504.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:505.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:505.2: alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:505.3: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:506.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:506.2: sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:507.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:507.2: sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca hetū;
patthana2.1:508.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:508.2: sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:509.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:509.2: alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.1:509.3: Lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:510.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:510.2: sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:511.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:511.2: sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:515.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava … pe … (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.1:520.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana2.1:520.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe … pe … (paripuṇṇaṃ nava), napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava.
patthana2.1:522.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:523.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:523.2: sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā;
patthana2.1:524.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.1:524.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā …
patthana2.1:527.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.1:531.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.1:535.1: Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.1:543.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:544.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:545.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:545.2: alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:547.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:548.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:548.2: hetuṃ ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:549.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:549.2: hetuṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:550.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:550.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati.
patthana2.1:550.7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.1:550.10: vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana2.1:550.11: Sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.1:550.14: Cetopariyañāṇena sahetukā ceva na ca hetucittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti;
patthana2.1:550.19: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:551.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:552.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:553.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:553.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:554.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:554.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:555.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:555.2: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:557.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:557.6: hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:558.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:558.4: hetuṃ garuṃ katvā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:558.6: hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:559.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:559.4: hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.1:559.6: hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:560.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:560.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.1:560.8: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana2.1:560.9: taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.1:560.11: sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:561.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:561.7: sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:562.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:562.7: sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:563.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:563.3: hetū ca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:564.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:564.3: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:565.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:565.3: hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.1:567.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:567.2: purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:568.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:568.2: purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:569.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:569.2: purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:570.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:570.2: purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:570.6: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:571.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:571.2: purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:572.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:572.2: purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:573.1: (Sahetuko ceva na ca hetumūlakaṃ tīṇipi ekasadisā.)
patthana2.1:574.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:574.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:575.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:575.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:576.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:576.2: purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:578.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:580.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:580.7: Hetū sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:580.9: Hetū hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:581.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:581.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:582.1: (Sahetuko ceva na ca hetumūlake iminākārena vitthāretabbā avasesā dve pañhā.)
patthana2.1:583.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:583.5: hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:583.6: (Dve mūlāni pucchitabbāni) Hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:583.8: Hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:585.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:587.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:587.4: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:587.8: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:588.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:588.4: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:588.8: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:589.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:589.4: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:589.8: sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:591.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:591.2: vipāko alobho adosassa amohassa ca vipākapaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ);
patthana2.1:591.4: (Yathā hetupaccayā evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ, navapi vipākanti niyāmetabbaṃ.)
patthana2.1:593.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.1:594.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:595.1: Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.1:596.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:599.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.1:602.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.1:610.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:618.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi.
patthana2.1:618.2: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha tīṇi), namagge tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:622.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:626.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:633.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:633.2: nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:634.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:634.2: nahetū sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:635.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:635.2: nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:636.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana2.1:636.5: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.1:637.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:637.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā. #2
patthana2.1:638.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:638.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.1:639.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:639.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.1:640.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:640.2: nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:641.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:641.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:641.6: nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.1:643.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:643.2: nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:644.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:644.2: nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana2.1:645.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:645.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā. #3
patthana2.1:646.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:646.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.1:649.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava), sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.1:653.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:653.2: nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.1:655.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:655.2: nahetū sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:656.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:656.2: nahetū ahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:657.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.1:657.2: nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:660.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:664.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:668.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … āhāre ekaṃ … pe … jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ … pe … vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.1:674.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.1:675.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:675.2: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.1:676.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:677.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:677.2: vatthuṃ paccayā nahetū sahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.1:678.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.1:679.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane cattāri … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.1:681.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.1:687.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:688.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare dve (sabbattha dve), magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana2.1:690.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.1:691.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.1:700.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:700.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati;
patthana2.1:700.7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.1:700.14: nahetū sahetuke khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.1:700.17: kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana2.1:700.18: cetopariyañāṇena nahetusahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:700.22: nahetū sahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:700.23: nahetū sahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:701.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:701.4: domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, nahetū sahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:702.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:702.6: nahetū ahetuke khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.1:702.9: kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana2.1:702.14: nahetū ahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana2.1:703.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:703.3: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:703.7: nahetū ahetuke khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.1:703.10: kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana2.1:703.11: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.1:703.13: Nahetū ahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:703.14: nahetū ahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana2.1:705.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:705.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.1:705.6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.1:705.7: Nahetū sahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.1:706.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:706.3: nahetu sahetukādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:707.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:707.3: nahetu sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.1:708.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.1:708.4: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:708.8: nahetū ahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana2.1:710.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:710.2: purimā purimā nahetū sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:711.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:711.2: nahetu sahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetuahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:711.3: nahetu sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya, nahetu sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ nahetuahetukassa bhavaṅgassa, nahetū sahetukā khandhā nahetuahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:712.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:712.2: purimā purimā nahetū ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:713.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:713.2: nahetu ahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetusahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:713.4: nahetū ahetukā khandhā nahetusahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:715.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo (iha ghaṭanā natthi, satta pañhā) …
patthana2.1:717.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:718.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:718.5: saddhā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:718.8: patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:718.11: patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.1:719.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:719.5: kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:719.9: senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.1:719.14: senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.1:720.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.1:720.5: kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.1:722.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.1:776.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha satta), nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate pañca.
